description.value:
When you select this option, you choose one of the following class features.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.6fkwjWZQqY7H3IX9]{Arena Training (Hybrid)}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.aMEnIfRkst9Uj75m]{Battlerager Vigor (Hybrid)}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.A9OTaQsLxvVp7qj5]{Brawler Style (Hybrid)}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.uSNaXv5xAeFUJC8E]{One-handed Weapon Talent (Hybrid)}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.aNPtKyqUc43kQlX0]{Tempest Technique (Hybrid)}

Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 144.
